parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Turrets </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Initiates the loading action on given weapon of the turret of a transport. So the new magazine is not available instantly, yet according to the reloadTime.<br>
The turret has to be manned. One can also change the magazine if its respective weapon is not selected. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> transport [[loadMagazine]] [turretPath, weaponName, magazineName]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> transport: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[loadMagazine]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], "m256", "20Rnd_120mmHE_M1A2"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[magazinesTurret]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[reload]], [[weaponState]], [[setWeaponReloadingTime]], [[weapons]], [[magazines]], [[Arma 3: Actions#SwitchMagazine|SwitchMagazine]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
